channel.title: Comments on: Lobster Elite Liberty Ball Machine Review
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: benjamin rio
item.dc:creator: benjamin rio
item.description:
Hi,
Thanks for your honest review.
What would you if you were in my shoes.
I may be able to get a brand new Liberty for around 1200 1300€ with a 2 year warranty. or buy a used Elite 3 for 850-900€ with a brand new battery. The machine is 12 years old.
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Thanks for your honest review.

What would you if you were in my shoes.

I may be able to get a brand new Liberty for around 1200 1300€ with a 2 year warranty.
or
buy a used Elite 3 for 850-900€ with a brand new battery. The machine is 12 years old.

item.title: By: Chad Walner
item.dc:creator: Chad Walner
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lobster-elite-liberty-ball-machine-review/#comment-4">tennis racket pro</a>.
Thank you. We're glad you agree with us about the Lobster. We appreciate your comment and will continue to post reviews of tennis products we find useful.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to tennis racket pro.

Thank you. We’re glad you agree with us about the Lobster. We appreciate your comment and will continue to post reviews of tennis products we find useful.
